desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.thai: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.ko: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在暗黑銀行等著貸款審查，此時蒙面的對策委員會學生們出現在她面前把現金偷走。黑市保鑣緊追在對策委員會一行人身後。亞瑠對對策委員會學生讓自己看見的壞蛋的真面目投以充滿憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。阿露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: Aru was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.jp: Aru was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.thai: Aru was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.ko: Aru was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠因記錄不良、無法進行財產抵押被拒絕貸款，而正與工作人員理論時，阿拜多斯一行人闖了進來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.thai: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.ko: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.ko: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯一行人威脅工作人員交出了記錄，順便把一億日元的資金給拿了出來。亞瑠在旁邊大為震撼，極為讚歎；其他成員在旁邊靜靜觀察。搶完後，銀行保安叫來了黑市守衛，眾人隨即開始作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。阿露在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；其他成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿拜多斯一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。亚瑠在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；其他成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿拜多斯一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。亚瑠在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；其他成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。
